item.title: Keir Starmer has kept Donald Trump on side - is it coming back to bite him? - BBC
item.description:
1. Keir Starmer has kept Donald Trump on side - is it coming back to bite him?  BBC
  2. The world’s rules have changed — Starmer must spell out Britain’s plan  The Times
